subSubSection.paragraph: This is a widespread species in south and southeast Asia, extending from India (Karnataka and Andhra Pradesh), Sri Lanka and Ceylon, east to Thailand, Vietnam, and Sabah. It has previously been recorded from Guangdong in China. The new data are additional records from Nanling Reserve in Guangdong and Hangzhou in Zhejiang Province of eastern China. Link to dynamic distribution map: http://hol.osu.edu/map-large.html?id=5010
